text: ileudoe adeuui baegseong-eul myeolhan hu neohuiga ileul gyeseungtolog hago neohuiga geu daejiwieseo geohadolog ha yeoss-euni neohuineun pyeong-won-e gungjeon-eul se ugo san-e jib-eul jieoss-eumae neohuineun hananim-eulobuteo bad-eun eunhyeleul sang-gihago daejiwieseo saagham-eul haenghajimalla
